name: The Great Egg Stand
description:
Your coop is being invaded by snakes! Defend your eggs by pecking them out! Stand for 60 seconds and one of the eggs will hatch.

How long can you stand?

Controls:
- Keyboard
    - A/D & Left/Right : Move Left/Right
    - Space : Peck
- Controller
    - Left Stick : Move Left/Right
    - A (X on PS4) : Peck

This  game was made with Bolt for Unity (by Ludiq) during the Summer Game Jam For Kicks.

The team is composed of
    Hoku (Programmer)
    Goldarcanine (2d Art)
    Chika Behappy (3d Art)

Assets not made by us
- Double Polka Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com) Licensed under Creative Commons: By Attribution 3.0 License http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/ - Potato Farmer font https://www.dafont.com/potato-farmer.font

Everything else was created during the jam.
